name: CÉ LA VI Singapore: Restaurant, SkyBar & Club Lounge

reviews.text:
Went to the CE LA VI bar at Marina Bay Sands around 3:30 PM on a Monday. As expected, the views are absolutely stunning—definitely a highlight and worth seeing once if you’re visiting. The $38 admission includes one well drink, which was fine but nothing special. Drinks overall are pricey, as you’d expect.

We were able to find a seat without much trouble, but the space itself is showing its age. Opened in 2010 and it feels like little has been done since to keep it fresh. The bathrooms, in particular, were surprisingly run down for such a high-end property.

All in all, it’s a solid one-time tourist stop—great for photos and the view, but probably not somewhere you’d return.

An absolutely unforgettable experience! Cé La Vi rooftop in Singapore offers a breathtaking view of the skyline — simply magical, especially at sunset. This place is a must-visit in the city! Head to the top of the iconic “boat” at Marina Bay Sands for a moment you won’t soon forget.

Entry costs around $30 to $35, but that amount is deducted if you order something to eat or drink at the bar— definitely worth it! The vibe is chic, the service is excellent, and the cocktails are top-notch. Perfect for a memorable night with panoramic views of the entire city. Don’t miss it!

Ce La Vi was a fabulous experience. The food was great and the service even better. We did have a 400 singapore dollar minimum to spend in order to get a sofa table that overlooks singapore. It was well worth it with stunning views and excellent food. Our server was amazing. It was sunny and she took the time to get us sunscreen In addition to being very attentive. We will come back!

This place has an amazing view. The restaurant is in a separate area from the pub, and you can access the pub after enjoying a good meal. The food is really good, making it worth dining here. The atmosphere is also very pleasant and beautiful. From the pub’s terrace, you can get a stunning view of Singapore from above—the Marina Bay is quite tall. I highly recommend the visit!

Had an amazing time at CÉ LA VI Singapore! The food was super good, the place looked awesome, and the service was great. Everyone was so friendly, big thanks to Ruby and Belle for making sure we had the best experience. Highly recommend this spot and we’ll definitely be back!
